name: Scovillain
flavorText: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

previous.name: Capsakid
previous.flavorText: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.

next.name: Rellor
next.flavorText: This Pokémon creates a mud ball by mixing sand and dirt with psychic energy. It treasures its mud ball more than its own life.
